languages.text: "Некоторые мои спутники обвинили меня в отступничестве от Императора... Но не ты. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "Зная, что я служу богам истинным, а ты — ложному. Зная, что некоторые от меня отвернулись... Ты решила остаться. Почему?"

languages.text: "Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"
languages.original_text: "Некоторые мои спутники обвинили меня в отступничестве от Императора... Но не ты. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"
"Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"
"Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"
"Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"
"Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"
"Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"
"Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"

languages.text: "Einige meiner Gefährten werfen mir vor, ich würde mich vom Imperator abwenden. Ihr nicht. Warum nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: "Einige meiner Gefährten werfen mir vor, ich würde mich vom Imperator abwenden. Ihr nicht. Warum nicht?"

languages.text: « Certains de mes compagnons m'ont {mf|accusé|accusée} d'avoir tourné le dos à l'Empereur, mais vous n'en faites pas partie. Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: « Certains de mes compagnons m'ont {mf|accusé|accusée} d'avoir tourné le dos à l'Empereur, mais vous n'en faites pas partie. Pourquoi ? »

languages.text: «Algunos de mis compañeros me han acusado de dar la espalda al Emperador, pero no usted. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: «Algunos de mis compañeros me han acusado de dar la espalda al Emperador, pero no usted. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: 「仲間の一部は、皇帝に背を向けたことで私を非難した。だが、お前は違う。それはなぜだ？」
languages.original_text: "Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: 「仲間の一部は、皇帝に背を向けたことで私を非難した。だが、お前は違う。それはなぜだ？」

languages.text: “我的一部分同伴指责我背弃了帝皇，不过你却没有这么做，这是为什么？”
languages.original_text: "Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: “我的一部分同伴指责我背弃了帝皇，不过你却没有这么做，这是为什么？”

languages.text: "Yoldaşlarımdan kimisi, beni İmparator'un yolundan çıkmakla suçluyor. Sense suçlamıyorsun. Neden?"
languages.original_text: "Some of my companions have accused me of turning away from the Emperor. But not you. Why is that?"
